Sunhawk gets the sensors online.  He sees what they report and locks 
the doors to keep bots from leaving.

Sunhawk:  SLAG IT WE'VE GOT MAJOR ENERGON READINGS!  NO ONE SHOULD 
LEAVE WITHOUT A BEAST MODE!
